meanings.definition: Altered or distorted by a change in medium or direction
meanings.sent1: The refracted image in the water looked wavy and distorted.
meanings.sent2: The refracted message through the glass was hard to decipher.
meanings.sent3: The refracted reflection in the spoon made her face look stretched.
meanings.sent4: His refracted memories of the event were hazy and unclear.
meanings.sent5: The refracted colors of the sunset painted the sky in a magical way.
